backend/main.mo: Motoko actor handling user profiles with access control plus a public contact form system storing timestamped submissions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a single UI text‑update feature to affected frontend file and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of frontend file summaries describing major components, styles, and backend interaction types.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS variables and theme definitions for light and dark modes using OKLCH values.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Renders the LandingPage component as the sole application view.
frontend/src/components/landing/ContactF: React form with validation and submission of name, email, subject, and message using a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/landing/ContactS: Contact section with location info, updated Get in Touch text, email link, and embedded contact form.
frontend/src/components/landing/Footer.t: Footer with email, Twitter, WhatsApp links and humorous attribution text.
frontend/src/components/landing/HeroSect: Hero banner with title, subtitles, animated elements, and CTA buttons including TripAdvisor.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingP: Renders the full landing page layout with a background image and sections like hero, offers, reviews, contact, and footer.
frontend/src/components/landing/OffersSe: Displays a grid of tour feature cards with emojis and descriptions explaining the unique selling points.
frontend/src/components/landing/ReviewCa: Shows an individual review with star ratings, excerpt text, and reviewer name.
frontend/src/components/landing/ReviewsS: Renders a reviews section containing multiple ReviewCards and a TripAdvisor call‑to‑action.
frontend/src/components/landing/TripAdvi: Provides a styled button linking users to the TripAdvisor reviews page.
frontend/src/content/curatedReviews.ts: Exports a list of hard‑coded curated reviews with reviewer info, rating, and excerpts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements context and provider logic for Internet Identity authentication and state management.
Defines a mutation for submitting contact form data through the backend actor and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS setup, theme variables, and custom utility classes for text shadows and styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with react-query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions to get, store, persist, and clear URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature tracking, and the pending request to update the 'Get in touch' bubble text.
